__prompts__.github_username: GitHub username (used for Docker image, leave empty to use your organization name)
__prompts__.organization_name: GitHub organization name (used as fallback if username is not provided).
__prompts__.reader_name: Name of your reader (short, lowercase, no spaces)
__prompts__.supported_nxdl: Primary application definition this reader supports
__prompts__.zenodo_record: Zenodo record (last number in DOI, if available)
__prompts__.include_nomad_example_upload: Include a NOMAD example upload entry point?
__prompts__.include_nomad_app: Include a NOMAD app entry point?
__prompts__.north_tool_name: Name of the NOMAD North tool, if include NOMAD North tool is 'y'
